synopsis:
The OVA will be focus on when Kujaku Nijou first entering group, which occurs one year before the main anime begins.

(Source: MAL)

title.en: Special 7: Special Crime Investigation Unit - One Year Earlier: Kujaku Nijo's Melancholy
title.jp: Keishichou Tokumubu Tokushu Kyouakuhan Taisakushitsu Dainanaka: Tokunana OVA
